title: Challenge 4: DHT22
description: Use the DHT22 sensor to read temperature and humidity values.
codeSolution:
import dht
from machine import Pin
import time

dht_sensor = dht.DHT22(Pin(5))

while True:
    dht_sensor.measure()
    temperature = dht_sensor.temperature()
    humidity = dht_sensor.humidity()

    print('Temperature:', temperature, 'Â°C')
    print('Humidity:', humidity, '%')

    time.sleep(1)
